function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective inactivation of airborne bacteria by upper-room UVGI","Impact":"Increased spread of infectious particles, higher risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of UV lamp configurations, proper ventilation flow rate management","Technologies":"UVGI systems, CFD models for airflow analysis","People":"Occupants of the test room, potentially people in surrounding areas","Owner":"Building management, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Reduction in effectiveness of UVGI with higher ventilation flow rate","Impact":"Lower percentage of particles inactivated, reduced antimicrobial activity","Mitigation":"Optimization of ventilation flow rate, strategic placement of UVGI systems","Technologies":"Ventilation flow rate sensors, CFD models for airflow analysis","People":"Occupants of the test room, potentially people in surrounding areas","Owner":"Building management, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Ineffective cleansing of infectious particles in upper-room UVGI zone","Impact":"Inability to eliminate infectious particles, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Strategic placement of UVGI systems, airflow analysis for optimal particle movement","Technologies":"Airflow analysis software, CFD models for particle movement","People":"Occupants of the test room, potentially people in surrounding areas","Owner":"Building management, HVAC technicians"}]}
